hero.title: 30 Minutes After Work,
hero.subtitle: Understand concepts in Korean first, then conquer the English exam. A structured CBT study plan designed for working professionals.

featuresSection.title: Why Busy Professionals Pass with CloudMaster
featuresSection.subtitle: Maximum efficiency in minimum time. Korean explanations, real CBT practice — everything you need.

features.title: Realistic CBT Environment
features.desc: Timer, auto-save, bookmarks, and question navigation — practice in conditions identical to the real exam.

features.title: Korean Explanations First
features.desc: Every question comes with detailed Korean explanations. Understand the concept fully before tackling the English exam.

features.title: Target Your Weak Spots
features.desc: Topic-by-topic score analysis pinpoints exactly where you're weak, so you can drill only what matters.

features.title: 30-Minute Session Design
features.desc: Short sessions after work or on weekends — consistent 30-minute blocks that stack into real exam-ready skills.

features.title: Domain-Focused Study
features.desc: No need to study everything. Target weak domains and use your limited time efficiently.

features.title: Study on Your Commute
features.desc: Study on the subway, bus, or during lunch. Install as a PWA for app-like speed anywhere.

steps.title: Solve Today's Questions
steps.desc: Work through 10–20 CBT questions under timed conditions. Just 15 minutes after work.

steps.title: Review Wrong Answers
steps.desc: Read the detailed explanations for every mistake. Understanding why you were wrong is the key.

steps.title: Identify Weak Domains
steps.desc: Check your analytics report to find today's weak domain and plan your focus for tomorrow.

routine.title: The 30-Min AWS Pass Routine
routine.subtitle: Follow this routine daily and you'll be ready to pass in 2–3 months.

steps.title: Solve Today's CBT Questions
steps.desc: Work through 10–20 questions in a timed CBT environment to keep your exam instincts sharp.

steps.title: Review Wrong Answers
steps.desc: Read the detailed explanations for every mistake. Understanding why you were wrong is the key to not repeating it.

steps.title: Check Your Weak Domains
steps.desc: Pull up your analytics report, note today's weak domain, and plan what to focus on tomorrow.

testimonials.title: Pass Stories
testimonials.subtitle: Real results from working professionals who made the time.

items.name: Kim Minjun
items.quote: Passed in two and a half months studying 30 minutes after work. The Korean explanations were invaluable, and being able to study on mobile during my commute made it sustainable.

items.name: Lee Seoyeon
items.quote: AI certification felt daunting, but locking in the concepts with Korean explanations first, then drilling CBT questions, made it click. Passed on the first try.

items.name: Park Dohyun
items.quote: Meetings, overtime — the works. But the short session format meant I could always squeeze in study time. The weak-spot drills right before the exam pushed me over the line.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start free, upgrade when you're ready.

questions.q: How much time do I need to study each day?
questions.a: 30 minutes a day is enough. A routine of 15–20 CBT questions and reviewing wrong answers consistently for 2–3 months builds solid exam-ready skills.

questions.q: Can I pass the English exam by studying in Korean?
questions.a: Yes. AWS officially supports Korean-language exams. Understanding concepts deeply in Korean first, then training with English CBT questions, is actually a highly effective strategy.
We currently offer AIF-C01 (AI Practitioner), SAA-C03 (Solutions Architect Associate), and DEA-C01 (Data Engineer Associate). More certifications are being added.

questions.q: Can I study on mobile during my commute?
questions.a: Absolutely. CloudMaster is a PWA and can be installed like an app on your phone. Study on the subway, bus, or during your lunch break.

questions.q: What if I close the app mid-exam?
questions.a: No worries. Progress is auto-saved after every answer. You can resume exactly where you left off, even after losing connection.

cta.title: Start Your 30-Min Routine Tonight
cta.subtitle: Thousands of working professionals have passed AWS exams with CloudMaster. You're next.
